short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension which grabs emails of a page and makes it possible to open them directly in mailbox.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ever had to find a specific email adress on a webpage? With this title grabber all you need to do is simply open the page you would like to search on open the extension click a button and it wil provide you every single email address that is on the web page.
